remarks: ` G ` actually extends ` F ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
cncfioobdlem.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
cncfioobdlem.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cncfioobdlem.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A (,) B ) --> V ) $.
cncfioobdlem.g $e |- G = ( x e. ( A [,] B ) |-> if ( x = A , R , if ( x = B , L , ( F ` x ) ) ) ) $.
cncfioobdlem.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( A (,) B ) ) $.
cncfioobdlem $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` C ) = ( F ` C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
